summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of King Street, from Fifth Avenue South to Twelfth Avenue South; Weller Street, from Fifth Avenue South to Maynard Avenue; Lane Street, from Fifth Avenue South to Seventh Avenue South; Charles Street, from Seattle Boulevard to Seventh Avenue South; Fifth Avenue South, from Jackson Street to Dearborn Street; Maynard Avenue, from Weller Street to Seattle Boulevard; Seventh Avenue South , from Dearborn Street to Charles Street, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 5931, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
